trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture"> </xref> de e para outros tipos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: A classe de MouseGestureConverter converte apenas uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>e para <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: The MouseGestureConverter converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: O MouseGestureConverter converte de e para um <xref:System.String>utilizando o caráter "+" como delimitador entre as chaves de modificador e a ação de rato.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de `Control+RightClick` teria de ser convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>com uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>propriedade igual e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>converte de e para um <xref:System.String>utilizando a chave "+" como delimitador entre as chaves de modificador e a ação de rato.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de `Control+RightClick` teria de ser convertida para um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>com uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>propriedade igual e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>converte de e para um <xref:System.String>utilizando a chave "+" como delimitador entre as chaves de modificador e a ação de rato.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> converts to the string `Control+RightClick`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A>igual a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys>e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A>igual a propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>converte a cadeia `Control+RightClick`.</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture>
